plugin.name: Multi Select Filter
plugin.label: Multi Select Filter
plugin.description: Adds Multi Select Dropdown with Filter Custom Field in Content Manager
plugin.dropdown.info.hint: Filter and Select an item to be added to the list
plugin.list.notification.alreadyContains: Selected item has already been added to {itemList}
plugin.settings.info.title: Configure Multi Select Dropdown with Filter
Entity Uid or Api Endpoint is required
plugin.settings.fields.defaultApiEndpoin: Api Endpoint or Entity Id is required
plugin.settings.fields.defaultQueryLimit: Limit the number of items in the Dropdown
plugin.custom-field.advanced.entityUid.d: Entity Uid to be shown the Multi Select Dropdown
plugin.custom-field.advanced.apiEndpoint: Api Endpoint to load data for Multi Select Dropdown
plugin.custom-field.advanced.publishedOn: Show only published items in the Multi Select Dropdown
